Field Label: Record ID

Request ID
Autopopulated by REDCap hook

Person ID of User
Autopopulated by REDCap hook
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: SELECT a.record,   CONCAT(   max(if(a.field_name = 'firstname', a.value, '')),    ' ',   max(if(a.field_name = 'lastname', a.value, '')),   ' | ',    max(if(a.field_name = 'email', a.value, ''))) as value  FROM redcap_data a  WHERE a.project_id=2128 GROUP BY a.record ORDER BY value

Field Label:
Research Group ID of User
Autopopulated by REDCap hook
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: SELECT a.record,   CONCAT(   max(if(a.field_name = 'region_name', a.value, NULL)),    ' (',   max(if(a.field_name = 'region_code', a.value, NULL)),   ') ' ) as value  FROM redcap_data a  WHERE a.project_id=2127  GROUP BY a.record  ORDER BY value

Field Label:
PI Level of User
